item.title: Rubiks
item.description: Introduction The Rubik’s cube is a 3D - combination puzzle invented in 1974 by a Hungarian sculptor and professor of architecture Ern≈ë Rubik. It was initially called the magic cube but as the toy slowly became an international sensation the business men marketed it as the Rubik’s cube, a much more catchy name. The cube comprises of 6 faces of different color where a solved state of the cube occurs when all the faces of the cube has a single color.
